name: Tower of the Dead (Podgurski)
description:
Survive to a zombie apocalypse, using your weapons and strategy to fire.

Press button: 1 for pistol, 2 for machine gun, 3 for shotgun, 4 for bazooka, You will be able to switch weapons to unlock it

After you kill all enemies in  level 2, press X to continue.

Developer team:

Lucas:  Progamming

Taher: Arte 2D

Agatha: Efeitos sonoros e Musicas
